servinfo.title: DTC P0107: Manifold Absolute Pressure Circuit Low Input

servinfosub.title: Wiring Diagram
servinfosub.ptxt: Refer to DTC P0106: Manifold Absolute Pressure Range / Performance:For Petrol Engine Model .

servinfosub.title: DTC Detecting Condition and Trouble Area

entry.ptxt: Manifold absolute pressure sensor output voltage is lower than 0.2 V for 0.5 sec continuously.

attention3.ptxt: When DTC P0532 and P1501 are indicated together, it is possible that “GRY/RED” wire circuit open.

s1.ptxt: Connect scan tool to DLC with ignition switch turned OFF.
Turn ON ignition switch and clear DTC using scan tool and warm up engine completely.
Run engine at idle speed for 1 min.

attention3.ptxt: Before this trouble shooting is performed, read the precautions for DTC troubleshooting referring to Precautions for DTC Troubleshooting:For Petrol Engine Model .

testgroup.question: Was “Engine and Emission Control System Check” performed?

action.ptxt: Go to Engine and Emission Control System Check:For Petrol Engine Model .

testgroup.title: MAP sensor and its circuit check

test1.ptxt: Connect scan tool to DLC with ignition switch turned OFF.
Check intake manifold pressure displayed on scan tool.

testgroup.question: Is it 0 kPa (0 in.Hg)?

paragroup.ptxt: Intermittent trouble. Check for intermittent referring to Intermittent and Poor Connection Inspection .

testgroup.title: MAP sensor power supply voltage check

test1.ptxt: Disconnect connector from MAP sensor with ignition switch turned OFF.
Check for proper connection of MAP sensor at “GRY/RED”, “RED/WHT” and “GRY/GRN” wire terminals.
Turn ON ignition switch, measure voltage between engine ground and “GRY/RED” wire terminal of MAP sensor connector.

testgroup.question: Is voltage 4 – 6 V?

testgroup.title: MAP sensor power supply circuit check

test1.ptxt: Disconnect connectors from ECM with ignition switch turned OFF.
Measure resistance between “GRY/RED” wire terminal of MAP sensor connector and “C37-14” terminal of ECM connector.

testgroup.question: Is resistance below 3 Ω?

test1.ptxt: Connect connectors to ECM with ignition switch turned OFF.
Measure voltage between “RED/WHT” wire terminal of MAP sensor connector and engine ground with ignition switch turned ON.
Disconnect connectors from ECM with ignition switch turned OFF.
Measure resistance between “C37-55” terminal of ECM connector and vehicle body ground.

action.ptxt: “RED/WHT” wire is shorted to ground circuit.

test1.ptxt: Check MAP sensor according to Manifold Absolute Pressure (MAP) Sensor Inspection:For Petrol Engine Model .

action.ptxt: Substitute a known-good ECM and recheck.
